reviews.review: A must play, if a bit short.
Anyone who dislikes this game is wrong.
wtf its 2 dollars during steam sale why would u not get it smh

Portal is a puzzle game like no other. The concept of portal is that you shoot a blue portal then you can shoot another one which is orange and walk through them. This is probably the most innovative idea i have seen in a while. Puzzles are fun to complete but get repetitive quite quickly. This I feel is the main let down, there are enemies in the game but very little the game doesn't mix things up.

You have probably heard already that this game is very short. My first play through was just under 1hr 30mins which is really short for a game but it needed to be shortened otherwise it would've just dragged on and got boring after. Portal comes with some bonus levels and those are rather short too but a good fun time-waster, I now play these bonus maps in the background while waiting for games to load up.To be honest there is not much I can say other than its the best puzzle game I have ever played so far. Unlike puzzles in Zelda these ones are actually fun to complete and require no backtracking whatsoever. I am keeping this review short because the game it self is short and I have said all there is to say. Pick it up on a sale you wont be disappointed

With that said i would give portal a

7/10: A Good Game
fun

bu oyun gerçekten çok iyi. belki bazıları sıkılıp hemen oynamayı bırakacak ama insan kafa yordukça ve başardıkça gerçekten çok zevk alıyor.özellikle sondaki şarkı da 10 numara :)

4/5. Portal is insane. I would give it a 5/5, but it's story is really short. It took me less than 2 hours to beat it, so I recommend the bundle. The gameplay from the trailer is completely different and so is the graphics than the actual game. It doesn't have the feel the trailer gives it. On the other hand, It runs 80-120 fps on nearly any machine because it is kind of old but still good. The graphics are very good, the loading doesn't take long, and the gameplay is great. Playing Portal 2, however, makes me miss the double-fling from this one as well as the shape of the Portal Device, which changes in Portal 2(it's a little flatter). Get the both games bundle.
Um jogo de ótima jogabilidade e narrativa envolvente. Perfeito!

Portal is one of those games on steam that you have to play at least once. The game is fairly short however its a brilliant and well thought out offering lots of puzzles which require in depth thinking to complete. 

Even though the game is shorter than portal 2, its still very fun and offers some challenges and advanced portal maps after you have completed the main game allowing for replayability and more oppotunities to get achievements. 

I recommend buying this portal game before you go into portal 2 as this game offers some backstory that will make the storyline of portal 2 make more sense.

9/10

The game is very good, however there is not much content. There are 19 missions (doable in 2-3 hours) and six of them are avaiable in harder version and with extra challenges (such as time/step/portal limit).

The gameplay is too short for £7, but if you can get this game on -80% sale - go for it.

关于Portal，我能说些什么呢，这款游戏在玩法和剧情上都有极其出色的表现，开发者注释部分更是大好评，如果说前面的关卡只是在有限的空间中解谜，那么最后一关的探索无疑使整个游戏的表现上了一个台阶。
Me lo ha fatto scoprire un amico, gioco bellissimo.

G.L.A.D.O.S is simply the best villain ever to be conceived. Ok first about the game. Portal inovated every aspect of puzzle games introducing a VERY interesting story/narrative and using an FPS perspective but without any shooting. Just you, a portal gun and a new way of thinking with portals. The puzles get each time more difficult but the game always finds a way to give you hints (usually subcontient hints, using mainly the level desing) as where to go next. The physics is amazing here and the portals is something that one cannot explain, it is like explaining how to ride a bike, really. You will only understand how interesting is to solve those portal puzzles when you begin to do that. This game took some 24 hours at the first time to finiish it and 7 hours on a second time, so it is a short game if you know your way, but nevertheless those were the most funny hours I ever played in a game.

Ok game asside, let´s talk GLADOS. This is simply the best character ever! From some point in the game the puzles, the story, everything else is just eclipsed but the dark, acidic humor of the villain. You do no want to finish the game anymore you just want to see what will be the next line GLADOS will say. Really, in various parts of the game I reloaded just to see again what she said.
its short but fun!
很好玩，操作难度不高，主要是对传送枪的应用。
Great and fun.

I've wanted to play this for a long time but never actually picked up the Orange Box collection on the many times I had the chance, but during the last sale I finally picked it up, and I wasn't disappointed. It is surprising how a relatively simple idea of a device that opens static portals can turn into very complicated puzzles, but the base game progresses in a way that doesn't become too difficult, yet still offers a challenge in later levels and the bonus maps. The game is also filled with humor, especially from the always-watching GLaDOS that is quick to offer comments from helpful to snarky, and even downright psychotic near the end of the game, and from automated machine gun turrets that sound and speak like children. To me, though, the best feature of the game is the modding, and there are some excellent mods for this game available both on Steam and other locations on the internet. I recommend Rexaura and Portal: Prelude, the latter of which is a prequel to Portal before the GLaDOS system was first turned on.
really good for relaxing and teasing your brain . worth it

Geniale rompicapo, non troppo difficile una volta entrati nell'ottica di come funzionano i portali e quindi arriverete in fondo abbastanza in fretta. Detto questo, consiglio vivamente di resistere all'impulso di cercare video su youtube che mostrino come risolvere la stanza corrente, primo perchè esclamereste sicuramente "ah ma è così facile, ci sarei arrivato da solo" e secondo perchè vi perdereste il senso di soddisfazione dopo il completamento di una stanza. Piuttosto mollate il gioco prima del rage quit e riprendetelo in mano un'altra volta.
Non voglio spoilerare la storia che guida la protagonista in questa serie di test ma sappiate solo che diventa sempre più inquietante fino al risvolto finale, con un sempre presente humour nero.
Visto il costo, invece del singolo titolo cercate il bundle su Steam che comprende anche il secondo capitolo, graficamente più appetibile.

Great game! The only annoying part is if you get stuck and don't know where to go, you can always look at a walkthrough on Youtube if you get stuck. The game itself isn't too difficult, and the boss took me two tries to beat. Great gameplay, good graphics, I reccomend getting it!

Still my favorite puzzle game of all time. There's so much to love about this. What's great is that it has tremendous replay value if you finish it, wait a couple of years, then return to it. Sure, I have an edge because I know the mechanics and the basics of each puzzle, but it's still a fun exercise in critical thinking.

Plus, a puzzle game with a discernible storyline? Even better! Great game.
It's a partially fast-paced puzzle game that's addicting if you get far enough into it. Nice work!
jogo divertido e com puzzles super elaborados,a campanha é um pouco curta mas vale o investimento! :D 10/10
this game is awesome

Wow. What an amazing game.

Pros:
Great storyline
Great puzzles- some were actually pretty hard, which I liked - there's still one that I'm not sure if I beat the way I was supposed to
Hilarious commentary - GLaDOS was amazing
Great atmosphere - the music and scenery really set the mood

Cons:
Short story - beat it in a couple of hours
Easy bossfight
Great game. A little short. But really fun.

Взяла начало из маленькой игры, сделанной студентами, "Narbacular Drop"; Их пригласили в Valve разрабатывать новую игру; Я этому очень рад. Если бы не они, возможно мир никогда бы не увидел ныне легендарную серию Portal. Первая часть является скорее технодемкой, чем полноценной игрой. Да, несомненно, там есть сюжет, персонажи (1,5) но, всё же, разработчики будто только набивали руку. И эта игра всё ещё является прекрасной.

é um jogo obrigatório para qualquer pessoa que se considera um gamer 
portal é um jogo onde você é uma pessoa cujo não sabemos nome , idade e nem nada só que é uma mulher que esta sendo testada e uma voz guia muito seria e que falha as vezes (faz umas piadinhas de vez em quando) ela é sua guia durante todo o jogo porem nunca pronuncia seu nome e nem nda sobre você a minha recomendação é que não confie sempre nela pois ela mente e depois diz que esta te testando

o jogo faz você se sentir isolado num lugar onde você não conhesse ninguem (só essa maquina sem personalidade) o que as vezes te deixa um pouco triste pois você esta sempre andando em circulos no meio de um monte de puzzles 

o jogo custa apenas 20r$ mas no momento esta por 4r$ se você da prioridade a oltros jogos mais caros ao invé dele você esta errado agora se você não compra-lo em quanto estiver em promoção você esta mais errado ainda 

resumindo portal é um ótimo jogo que faz cada segundo jogado ser uma nova experiência

Tests are not as good as in Portal 2, but climate is better (exception is Old Aperture from Portal 2 which is way more climatic to me) - you wake up in a facility and you think that this will be a normal logical game, then you visit Ratman's rooms and you start to think 'who made this paintings'? One of my all-time FAVORITE puzzle games, Portal is a great adventure with plenty of unique levels, hilarious lines of dialogue, and cake. Rather short, but worth the experience. Plus, if you haven't played it in a while, you forget most of the puzzles, so it's practically a new game at that point. Not much else to say, only get it if you like puzzles.

Egyszerűen imádom! Régen egyszer már kijátszottam ezt az első részét, de most nagyon örülök, hogy újra játszhatok ezzel és a 2. résszel!

A továbbfejlesztett tesztkamrák viszont igazi kihívások, a sima misszió gyerekjáték volt kijátszani, de a különleges pályák baromi nagy fejtörést és időt igényelnek, amire érdemes időt pazarolni.
completed the "story mode" in 2.1 hrs, but highly reccomend the game :)
